rioko.draw2d.borders

Class SideBorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.draw2d.AbstractBorder
      • rioko.draw2d.borders.SideBorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.draw2d.Border
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BottomBorder, CompleteBorder, TopBorder

    public class SideBorder
extends org.eclipse.draw2d.AbstractBorder
    Class extending AbstractBorder and give an interface to manage standard box borders.
    Author:
    Antonio
